item.title: Version 1.2.0
item.description:
We update Hack Driver app frequently to improve your services and customer success.
- We've made some changes to the layout when a trip is being confirmed. - We've made some updates on how we show the cost for a trip when a customer increase the price.
Hope you appreciate our app and we want to be part of your success. We love to hear your feedback or questions, please contact us hackrides.com
